DryadDataFile.dcterms:creator: Dahlberg, C. Johan
Ehrlén, Johan
Hylander, Kristoffer
DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Performance of Forest Bryophytes
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description:
Field data was collected between April/May and September/October 2011. In case it was processed, this took place in 2011-2013. Data from ArcGIS Desktop was collected in 2011-2013.
Performance data was collected in the field and processed in Excel, Access and GIMP. Microclimatic data (temperature) was measured in the field and processed in Excel and Access. The processed temperature data refers to the period 29th of May until 28th of September 2011. Other environmental data was collected both in the field and for some variables through ArcGIS Desktop. Data collected in the field was for a few variables processed in Excel. Soil and litter samples was dried for pH-measurements in lab (2011).
We refer to the manuscript and the metadata of the uploaded excelfile for further details on the data.
